title: Together
alt: John and Mary from Children of Morta

content.html: Co-op with Val has come a long way, I'd say. From sliding down snowy mountains as a wolf cub and deer in Blanc, to endure-and-surviving the waves of buffed-up spiders, goblins, ghosts, and skeletons in the dungeons of Children of Morta.
We're tough as nails now; keep 'em bosses coming.
